website_summaries.verdict: Lighter-weight stairs that perform well and provide a safe entry into your pool.
pros: Easy to take out if you need to clean them
Don't protrude too far into the water
cons: Ladder is a little difficult to put together
Hand rails aren't as strong as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Great set of stairs
customer_reviews.text: These were fairly easy to assemble...just follow all the instructions (including the part where you run warm water over the plastic you need to bend). I did drill a few small holes along the side panels to help the water fill the steps - the extra holes had them filled within a few minutes. I did not use extra weights to hold the stairs down and they have worked great. MUCH sturdier than ladder provided with pool. Now the whole family feels safe climbing in & out of the pool. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was the cheapest piece of crap ladder I have ever seen. Came in so many pieces to put together and then it took three strong men to hold part of it while the other tried to bend and align the wholes without other side popping out....You then need to go out and purchase gravel to fill up the hollow legs and then have to saw the handles to measure with the pool.... it was a lot of work for the amount of money spent. We’ve only had it about three weeks and already the nodules have popped out of the holes and the steps are coming off. This is worst piece of crap I have ever seen!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Pope

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These steps work well for our pool. I had to make some mounting modifications only because of my deck design. They were easy to assemble and install. I did not use gravel for additional weight and had to have help keeping them down in the water for installation but had fun doing it. The only thing I don't like are the handrails, they are a little wobbly, I have to make sure the kids don't hang on them just in case... but I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: I bought upgraded steps when we bought the pool and it was hard to put together and it always came a part. We spent about $300.00. This ladder is more a ladder then steps because it stays closer to the pool wall but they are very solid and were easy to adjust since our deck is a little lower then the pool. The only issue I had was how the steps themselves fit in to each of the side pieces BUT once I figured that out they went together quite easily and they stayed together all the way from inside the house ( it was a hot day) to the pool at the side of the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok. The arms that attach into the deck are not very sturdy and wobble when using them. If I could rate this company, I would give 1 star. Horrible customer service. I ordered this ladder to replace an existing one for an up coming event. It was a prime item and suppose to arrive 9 days before the event. This would give ample time if it was a day or two off. I contacted the seller multiple times and never received a response as to the whereabouts of the item. The ladder finally arrived yesterday, 12 days after the stated arrival date. Still never received a response from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Craig K.

customer_reviews.title: Upper handles are weak..steps are great though
customer_reviews.text: The handles to get in and out of pool that are attached to the pool and deck are very weak. Almost floppy. Why they didn't make these stronger or covered metal..I don't know. Then they would be excellent. The steps themselves are great.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice stairs
customer_reviews.text: Really nice stairs. They don't take up too much room. Easier to get in an out of pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No directions, no hardware with the unit
customer_reviews.text: The ladder didn’t come with hardware or instructions/directions. The unit appears to be a combination of hardware and non-hardware assembly; however, I won’t know until I’m provided an update by the seller. I sent an email to the seller and they replied, they would conduct an inquiry and get back with me. I’ll update the review when Inknow more.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great pool step/ladder
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box. I had my doubts but it was pretty easy to put together. Once it was mounted to our wood deck it was perfect. Even easy exit and entry for 250 lb pound 60 year old. Very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: complex assembly

If you have a lot of time and skill, and a good friend that doesn't mind helping, it's doable.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Not all pieces are correct per instructions

customer_reviews.author: Robert Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Okay

customer_reviews.title: Worked well

customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the price. Still waiting to install in my pool. But it seems like it is exactly what our pool company was offering for twice the price.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Steps could have a little more depth but overall ok. Nice to be able to find a ladder in that 60" height range. Easy to modify the supports that connected to deck (they were too long and had to be cut).

customer_reviews.text: Stairs are a little steep and hand rail wobbly but easy to assemble. You have to back down the stairs or risk slipping off them for a quick entrance on the poo

customer_reviews.title: They hold someone that is close to 300 lbs just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take up too much room

customer_reviews.title: This was a terrible product it came with no hardware & no instructions

customer_reviews.title: Really nice....great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I would not say it was easy to assembly exactly, but it wasnt difficult either. Installing into the ppol was more challenging in that it wants to float. The instructions say fill it with sand but the sand would at times come out of the drain holes! Thats no good. So I drill a series of holes on the back of the frame and on each step to allow it to completly fill with water. It still wanted to float, but barely. So I fastened it down and all is GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Ringo

customer_reviews.title: Stability
customer_reviews.text: Worked out perfect for my dog that loves to jump in and out of the pool . Makes it easy for her to get out .

customer_reviews.title: DELUXE ABOVE GROUND POOL LADDER
customer_reviews.text: THIS LADDER WAS A LOT EASIER TO USE. IT WAS WIDER SO YOU CAN WALK UP AND DOWN STRAIGHT AHEAD RATHER THAN TURN SIDEWAYS TO FIT BETWEEN THE HAND RAILS LIKE THE ONES THAT COME WITH THE POOL WITH MAKES IT MUCH SAFER
customer_reviews.author: rose m carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too hard to assemble despite the ambiguous instruction sheet. The main problem was that the nuts/bolts did not match up and I had to buy matching sets at a local hardware store. Additionally, drilling holes through my top rail produced metal shavings that fell into the pool even though I held a container underneath. For $200, I expected a much easier installation. Also, make sure to buy a mat for under this or any ladder for added protection as most have some rough edges.
customer_reviews.author: wvbillz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These steps are great for an above-ground pool. They do not protrude too far into the swimming area of the pool... this is just what we were looking for and the price is a good deal. Now are Doberman can go swimming without us having to lift her out of the pool... she can go up the latter without ripping the liner with her claws. Two paws up =)
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

product_meta.title: Vinyl Works Deluxe Adjustable 24 Inch in-Pool Step Ladder Entry System for Above Ground Swimming Pools, Taupe
product_meta.description: We've all seen the hilarious home videos. There's an above-ground pool, a trampoline, and a knucklehead lying on the ground that wasn't quite able to bridge the gap between them. Getting into your pool should be the beginning of a relaxing afternoon, not the groundwork for more headaches. With the Vinyl Works IN Adjustable Above-Ground Pool Ladder, installing a safe and convenient entry to your backyard oasis certainly won't include any back-breaking work -- unlike the plans of the pool owners in those viral videos. With its versatile and stable design, this adjustable swimming pool ladder can fit comfortably over the walls of your above-ground pool to provide safe entry into the water for all ages. The two rails are set 24 inches apart and offer a sturdy support for those with pulling themselves up out of the water. And you might think this submersible pool ladder would be extra slippery for wet feet, but each step has a textured surface to easily grip while getting in and out. Whether your pool is large or small, this inclined design is going to give you more room to swim and splash with a 22-inch footprint that sturdily sits vertically against any of the perimeter walls. With the ability to adjust to a maximum height of 60 inches, it features 4 wide steps that can be both ascended and descended comfortably. The deck flanges at the top of this pool ladder have hardware to bolt into your pool deck and support up to 300 pounds at a time. With its heavy-duty plastic resin construction and stainless steel hardware that will not rust with constant use in the water, this system is built to stand up to everything a long, hot summer can throw at it. With only a few tools needed to assemble the prefabricated pieces, this ladder will ready to make your pool more accessible in no time. Don't give your friends and family the opportunity to end up in an viral video on their way into your backyard pool. Skip the jumping, sliding, and eventual embarrassing injuries by in
feature_bullets: IN-POOL STEP LADDER: In-pool step ladder with double handrails set 24 inches apart to offer a sturdy support when getting up out of the water. Designed and intended for use with a 46-60 inch above ground pool with up to 4.5- to 5-foot side walls and a flat bottom

GREAT STABILITY: 2 deck mount flanges for greater stability offering a 300-pound load capacity for one user at a time. Includes both deck mount flanges and front mount flanges (with hardware) that can be used to mount directly to a pool deck
SAFETY FEATURES: Step system is designed to prevent entrapment while allowing great circulation of the pool water. All stair treads have also been designed with a non-slip surface for safe use
MAXIMUM SWIM SPACE: Minimum obstruction of swimming space with a footprint of only 22 inches within the pool
NON DAMAGING: Smoothly rounded base allows step to be stable and not damage the pool liner. Constructed of maintenance free plastic resin and stainless steel hardware
